info.name: Customizable Color for ID Card
info.description:
⧸ Style for www.mycandylove.com ⧸
It's not an exact replica, but the differences should get smaller the longer I work on it.

* Case-sensitive.
** [In beta stage, not sure how well it will work in the long-run.] For browsers that support Linear-Gradients. If not, the solid card color will act as a fallback. (also, here's a good Gradient Generator to make things easier.)
*** Unfortunately, there's a character limit on the "free-form" text option. There's a way to get around this, but I don't know how well it works for different browsers. If you inspect the text box and change the "maxlength" number to a larger one (90 should be plenty), then you can bypass the max character limit for that single install/update (gif example).
info.additionalInfo:
When you encounter bugs or issues, please report them as No rating or OK in the discussions.
I will do all I can to solve the problem to the best of my ability!

Change Log

  1. Minor Update 0.9.4
    • Improved Image
  2. Minor Update 0.9.3
    • Minor edits to style settings.
  3. Options 0.9.2
    • Minor improvements and bug fixes.
    • Added Option to use linear-gradients. Note
  4. Patch 0.9.1
    • Better id card with a new appearance.
    • Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Sites Supported: ☑ http://www.amoursucre.com ☑ http://www.amordoce.com ☑ http://www.mycandylove.com ☑ http://www.sweetcrush.co.uk ☑ http://www.sweetamoris.de ☑ http://www.dolceflirt.it ☑ http://www.corazondemelon.es ☑ http://www.mijnzoeteliefde.nl ☑ http://www.sockerflirt.se ☑ http://www.flirttistoori.com ☑ http://www.sweetflirt.ro ☑ http://www.sladkiiflirt.ru/ ☑ http://www.slodkiflirt.pl ☑ http://www.csabitasboljeles.hu ☑ http://www.askito-m.com ☑ http://www.minsodeflirt.dk ☑ http://www.sukkersotkjaerlighet.com

DISCLAIMER

Just for fair warning.
  1. This style was created in google chrome, as it's my browser of choice. Whether or not this style is compatible with other browsers is a mystery to me.
  2. My overall knowledge of coding is limited — this is just a hobby I picked up recently — so most of my styles are created by trail and error.
With that all in mind, I hope you can all be patient with me, I assure you, I am doing my best!
